document_data.name: Moo Kalai
document_data.mainbody: '''Moo Kalai''' was a [[Carp hengeyokai|carp]] [[hengeyokai]] [[barbarian]] in [[Nam Tso]] in [[Tabot]] around {{YearlinkConvert|2607|SY}}.
document_data.Activities: Moo lived with his brothers and sisters in Nam Tso, typically swimming in its deep waters and hibernating in winter. He sometimes visited the markets at [[Bidnop So]] to trade [[rice]] and [[opal]]s collected by his people from the lake bed for things the carps couldn't manufacture.
document_data.Description: He had a very short stature, large eyes, and pale skin. He shaved his head smooth like the Tabotan lamas. He was very careful and was never seen eating or sleeping by [[human]]s.
